name: Lake Escape!
description:
Lake Escape is a defense game with a goal: Retrieve the motor that fell off your boat to get the hell off the lake!

You start with only a handgun but you can upgrade. Kill fish for points. The game last as long as it takes for you to get the motor. Windows download. Mouse and Keyboard compatible

CONTROLS:

Left Mouse click -- shoot
Right Mouse click -- toggle glowsticks
Double Right Mouse Clicks -- drop meat bait
1-3 keys --Changes weapons
Spacebar --defend melee attack
